definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
People's Republic of Bangladesh (formerly East Pakistan)
pinyin: Meng4 jia1 la1 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: What persuaded you to start Global Voices in Bangla?
sentences.chinese: 是什么使你决心开展孟加拉版的全球之声？

sentences.english: I had a great curiosity to see a Bengal village.
sentences.chinese: 我怀着极大的好奇心，想去看孟加拉的乡村。

sentences.english: Over a nine-month period, nine Bengals have been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的九个月间，孟加拉虎队有九名队员遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: Now about 60 percent of rural fish farmers in Bangladesh are women.
sentences.chinese: 现在，孟加拉国大约60%的农村养鱼人是妇女。

sentences.english: Nevertheless my elder brothers had always cultivated Bengali literature.
sentences.chinese: 但是我的哥哥们一直在培育孟加拉文学。

sentences.english: Part of the border with Bangladesh was sealed.
sentences.chinese: 和孟加拉的图框部分被封闭。

sentences.english: Uddin, another Bangdalesh guy in my home.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个住在我家里的孟加拉人。

sentences.english: We doubt whether there be a hundred Bengalese in the army.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑在这支军队中是否有一百个孟加拉人。

sentences.english: At the age of 14 Sohel from Bangladesh was the main breadwinner in his family.
sentences.chinese: 孟加拉国14岁的Sohel是家中的主要养家人。

sentences.english: Makeshift bamboo bridges span small waterways all over Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 横跨在小水路上的临时竹桥遍布孟加拉国。

sentences.english: Her party is working with others towards the benefit of Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 她的党正在与其他党派共同为孟加拉的利益而努力。

sentences.english: I resorted to all manner of subterfuges to escape the Bengal Academy.
sentences.chinese: 我使用一切可以逃避的手段来逃脱孟加拉中学。

sentences.english: Treatment of Bengalis in the late 60s and 71 war.
sentences.chinese: 上个世纪60年代末和71年战争对孟加拉人的暴行。

sentences.english: The Marxist thugs are out again to kill the common people in West Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义者暴徒再次出现，杀死西孟加拉普通平民。

sentences.english: In this way he got me to translate the whole play.
sentences.chinese: 如此这样，他让我把全剧都译成了孟加拉诗文。

sentences.english: The island of Sri Lanka, lies within the Indian Ocean, with the Bay of Bengal to the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡岛，位于印度洋内，东北边是孟加拉海湾。

definition: Indonesia (abbr. for 印度尼西亞|印度尼西亚)
Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]
pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1
